org.sd.crawl
Interface SiteInfoModule

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnalyzedUrlExtensionModule, BaseSiteInfoModule, BaseSuccessfulSiteInfoModule, ErrorPageModule, ExcessDescriptionModule, ExcessTitleModule, MissingDescriptionModule, MissingKeywordModule, MissingTitleModule, QueryPageModule, SiteInfo, UnanalyzedUrlExtensionModule, UrlExtensionModule
public interface SiteInfoModule

Interface for modules that collect site info.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Summary
 void addFailedLink(Link link, CrawledPage crawledPage)
          Add stats pertaining to a link whose destUrl couldn't be fetched.
 void addFetchedPage(CrawledPage crawledPage, int crawlDepth, DetailedUrl dUrl)
          Add stats pertaining to a newly fetched page.
 void addIgnoredLink(Link link)
          Add stats pertaining to a link that was not fetched (because the link follower indicated that it should not be fetched.)
 void addRevisitedPage(CrawledPage crawledPage, int crawlDepth, DetailedUrl dUrl)
          Add stats pertaining to a page that was previously visited.
 void addUnfollowedLinks(java.util.List<Link> links, SiteContext siteContext)
          Add stats pertaining to links from a page that will not be followed.
 Histogram<java.lang.String> getHistogram()
          Get the histogram of (string) data associated with this module.
 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUrls()
          Get the urls collected through this module.
 

Method Detail

addFetchedPage

void addFetchedPage(CrawledPage crawledPage,
                    int crawlDepth,
                    DetailedUrl dUrl)
Add stats pertaining to a newly fetched page.

NOTE: this is for crawledPages that have been fetched without error and with content.

Parameters:
crawledPage - The successful fetched page without error and with content.
crawlDepth - The crawl depth of the fetched page.
dUrl - (optional, ok if null) The DetailedUrl instance of the crawledPage's url.

addUnfollowedLinks

void addUnfollowedLinks(java.util.List<Link> links,
                        SiteContext siteContext)
Add stats pertaining to links from a page that will not be followed.

NOTE: this is for links, from a successfully fetched page, that will not be followed according to a link follower.

addRevisitedPage

void addRevisitedPage(CrawledPage crawledPage,
                      int crawlDepth,
                      DetailedUrl dUrl)
Add stats pertaining to a page that was previously visited.

NOTE: this is for crawledPages that have been fetched without error and with content, but whose urls have been previously visited and added as fetched pages.

Parameters:
crawledPage - The successful fetched page without error and with content.
crawlDepth - The crawl depth of the fetched page.
dUrl - (optional, ok if null) The DetailedUrl instance of the crawledPage's url.

addFailedLink

void addFailedLink(Link link,
                   CrawledPage crawledPage)
Add stats pertaining to a link whose destUrl couldn't be fetched.

Note that the crawledPage could be null, hold an error or no content.

addIgnoredLink

void addIgnoredLink(Link link)
Add stats pertaining to a link that was not fetched (because the link follower indicated that it should not be fetched.)

getHistogram

Histogram<java.lang.String> getHistogram()
Get the histogram of (string) data associated with this module.

Returns:
the histogram, or null if not applicable.

getUrls

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUrls()
Get the urls collected through this module.
